attributes.action: Petition for XL Bully dog breeds, not to be banned.
attributes.additional_details:
How can these be banned when there a numerous other dog breeds that are far more aggressive than the XL Bully? A quick search shows that the XL Bully is nowhere near the top 10 most aggressive dogs? When the number 1 is a chihuahua? Source: https://spotpetins.com/blog/breed-tips/most-aggressive-dog-breeds 
Another source suggests Jack Russells are most aggressive? And these are not banned, No.6 is a dachshund. 
Source: https://www.bulldogology.net/most-aggressive-dog-breeds/?expand_article=1
attributes.background: The government needs to stop the ban on XL bully dogs, why ban this breed of dog when backyard breeders and illegal breeders are a bigger cause for concern? Surely it should be down to the owners and the breeders or any breed of dog?

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
